_header: Royal banners unrolled of the King
Subjects: hymns, of the Passion; Passion, carols/songs of; translations
_description: ‘Vexilla regis prodeunt’, ascribed to John Lydgate — nine 8-line stanzas

CULKk16.First Lines:
ROyal Banerys vnrolled of the kyngTowarde his Batayle in Bosra
                    steyned Reede…
CULKk16.Last Lines:
…To þe holy Gooste grace to haue memorieOn his ffyue
                    woundes & his Passion
CULKk16.Attributed Title:
Here…begynneth the ymne vexilla regis prodeunte (f.
                        197v); Here enduth the ymne vexilla regis prodeunt (f.
                    199)
CULKk16.Facsimiles:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 25-7.
